mapper.select: select T.BANNER_ID,T.BANNER_PIC,T.FILE_ID,T.BANNER_NAME,T.ORGAN_LIMIT, T.BANNER_LVL,T.BANNER_ORDE,T.VAILD_DATE,T.EDITOR,T.EDITOR_TIME, T.STATUS,T.DEL_FLAG,T.SUMMARY,O.FILE_TYPE AS BANNER_PIC_TYPE,P.FILE_TYPE ,O.FILE_ADDR AS BANNER_PIC_ADDR ,P.FILE_ADDR from ${schema.configPlat}.MZJ_BANNER_DATA T LEFT JOIN ${schema.configPlat}.MZJ_FILES_DATA O ON T.BANNER_PIC=O.FILE_ID LEFT JOIN ${schema.configPlat}.MZJ_FILES_DATA P ON T.FILE_ID=P.FILE_ID WHERE T.STATUS='1' AND T.EDITOR_TIME BETWEEN #{START_DATE} AND #{END_DATE}
